Description

The Rainfall-Runoff Model IHACRES Reference: Jakeman, A.J. / Hornberger, G.M. (1993). How Much Complexity Is Warranted in a Rainfall-Runoff Model? Water Resources Research, (29), NO. 8 (2637-2649) Croke, B. F. W., W. S. Merritt, et al. (2004). A dynamic model for predicting hydrologic response to land cover changes in gauged and ungauged catchments. Journal Of Hydrology 291(1-2): 115-131.

Options
Number of sub-basinsChoiceNSUBBASINSAvailable Choices: [0] 2 [1] 3 [2] 4 [3] 5 [4] 6 [5] 7 [6] 8 [7] 9 [8] 10 Default: 0

StorageChoiceSTORAGEAvailable Choices: [0] Single Storage [1] Two Parallel Storages [2] Two Storages in Series !!! not yet implemented !!! Default: 0
Using the snow-melt module?BooleanSNOW_MODULEIf checked, snow-melt module is used.Default: 0
